scenario.name: TNG draw card midday drawing pending

call.actionword: I am on the home screen
it is 12:47pm
the TNG draw card midday displays a pending state
it auto updates to display the TNG midday results when they come in
the evening section displays "p1"

scenario.name: TNG draw card midday draw video link

call.actionword: I am on the home screen
I click on the TNG draw video link
the TNG draw video for that date is displayed

scenario.name: TNG draw card midday prize payout

call.actionword: I am on the home screen
I click the TNG Midday prize payout link
the midday prize payout information for that date is displayed in an overlay

scenario.name: TNG draw card midday video link pending

call.actionword: I am on the home screen
it is 12:47pm
the midday draw video link is not displayed while the pending state is displayed
the draw video link auto populates once the video is available
